nodes.text: Cortella the Righteous was a female Human Jedi living during or after the Cold War.

Cortella the Righteous was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic with Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion as a World Boss for Dark vs. Light system. Whenever Light side of the Force reaches victory state on a server, Cortella the Righteous has a chance to spawn at one or more of selected locations on Coruscant, Tatooine, Alderaan, Hoth and Dromund Kaas alongside other Light Side World Bosses. Though killing her is required for an in-game achievement, it is impossible to determine the year and the planet where her death took place.
